channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Reveals Its ‘Content Shredder’ As A Result Of Recent Lawsuit
item.description: One of the most controversial aspects of Destiny 2 over the years was Bungie’s Beyond Light-era decision to start putting things in a “content vault,”...

item.title: ‘Dragon Age: The Veilguard’ Hits PS Plus Already, Which Is Bleak
item.description: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is hitting PS Plus just four months after launch, cementing it as a commercial disaster for EA.

item.title: A New Approach To Childhood Neuroblastoma
item.description: Childhood neuroblastoma is often a fatal disease. A new approach using a combination of two drugs shows promise in reducing relapse rates and improvin...

item.title: Nvidia’s Revolutionary Tool For Learning American Sign Language
item.description: Nvidia's tool, Signs, exemplifies how AI can help create better communication channels for those with hearing disabilities and the hearing enabled in ...

item.title: The Threat Of Deepfakes: We Need Collaboration To Combat It
item.description: The rise of deepfakes poses a serious issue in the digital era, threatening to weaken confidence and cause division.
